content.rendered:
We provide engineering consultancy for installation of pipeline and SURF including:

  • Pipeline Route Assessment
  • Installation Analyses including
    • Pipelay analysis (static and dynamic)
    • On-bottom stability analysis
    • Free span analysis and rectification
    • Crossing analysis
    • Expansion analysis
    • Fatigue analysis
    • Davit lift analysis
    • Sub-sea lifting
  • Mooring Analysis/ DP Capability Analysis of Pipelay Vessel
  • Pipeline Protection
  • Subsea Foundation System Design
  • Dredging, Trenching and Backfilling Study
  • Risk Assessment

Computer software available in-house:

  • “MOSES” by Ultramarine Inc., U.S.A.
  • “ORCAFLEX” by Orcina Limited, United Kingdom
  • “SACS” by Engineering Dynamic Inc. U.S.A.
  • “FEMAP” with “NX NASTRAN” by Siemens
  • “GRLWEAP’ by Pile Dynamic., Cleveland, U.S.A.
  • “AllPile” by CivilTechSoftware, U.S.A
  • “OFFPIPE” by RCM Inc., Houston
  • “DPCAP” by Maritime Research Institute Netherlands
  • “AUTOCAD” by Autodesk Inc., U.S.A.
  • “ANSYS”
  • “Autopipe”

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Platform Installation Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide engineering consultancy for installation of fixed and floating platforms including: Fixed Platforms Offshore lifting studyJacket launching and upending studyTopside float-over and mating studyPlatform foundation study (Mudmat, Pile, Conductor)Structural integrity check during installationRisk Assessment Floating Structure and Mooring System Design and installation analysis of anchor system (driven pile, suction…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine & Offshore Engineering Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide marine & offshore engineering services in the major marine energy centers around the world. Our engineers have a good understanding of the local regulatory requirements, the available industry infrastructure and the culture they operate in.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Renewable Energy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is involved in supporting the development of offshore renewable energy by providing engineering consultancy for the following areas: Planning and QA/QC of Geotechnical and Geophysical Site Investigation and Laboratory Testing Site Assessment including Cable Route Foundation System Assessment (Gravity Based, Monopile, Tripod, Jacket)Mooring System Design and Analysis for Floating…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Risk Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has extensive experience in risk identification and marine risk management in concept development, detailed design, engineering, temporary phases and operations of both oil & gas offshore assets and the renewable energy sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dynamic Positioning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Electrical Engineers and Master Mariners specialise in performing annual dynamic positioning audits and failure mode effect analysis (FMEA), Failure mode effect criticality analysis (FMECA) and FMEA Gap analysis proving Trials.
